name: Veter
description:
Veter is an open world procedurally generated RPG set on an Earth-like planet. The game is inspired by Minecraft and Skyrim.

Explore the world and get resources.

Control:

W  - Up

S - Down

A - Left

D - Right

Q - Drop item

Mouse left- Attack

Mouse right - Use item

~  or /  - Console

F2 - Take a screenshot

F5 - Draw pos and fps

F6 - Draw colliders

F7 - Draw paths

F11 - Fullscreen
